availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Beriah Magoffin: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Civil Appointments, 1859-1862

body.p:
JOSEPH B. NONES,
NOTARY PUBLIC,
OF THE STATE OF NEW-YORK,
AND
COMMISSIONER
OF
New York,
Maryland
North Carolina,
South Carolina,
Georgia,
Texas,
Iowa,
Arkansas,
Pennsylvania,
Illinois,
Ohio,
Kentucky,
Alabama,
Mississippi,
Oregon,
Washington,
Virginia,
Tennessee,
Florida,
Louisiana,
Indiana,
Missouri,
Nebraska,
Kansas,
California,
Wisconsin,
Michigan,
Utah,
Minnesota,
New Mexico,
New Jersey.
Massachusetts,
New Hampshire
Rhode Island,
Connecticut,
Vermont,
Maine,
Delaware,
U. S. PASSPORTS and PROTECTIONS issued through J B. NONES.

N. B. -- Powers of Attorney, Deeds, Wills, Bonds and Mortgages, and all other writings, legally and neatly drawn and authenticated. Bounty Lands, Pensions and Extra Pay for Navy and Army, procured by J. B. N.

OFFICE, No. 262 BROADWAY, corner of WARREN STREET,
RESIDENCE, No. 76 SEVENTH STREET, (between 1st and 2nd Avenues.)
